content: 4 tc x 1 in magic_ring chain 3 slip_stitch into magic_ring snip yarn and tie off tighten the magic_ring and knot the loose ends together to secure them you ve finished repeat the above pattern until you have made 8 leaves now we will begin sewing the leaves onto the pot working between rounds 18 and 19 evenly space the leaves around knot the ends together and pass them through the body to secure each leaf flower grab your yarn and let s get started 8 single_crochet in magic_ring slip_stitch into 1st single_crochet chain 3 ps^7 chain 3 slip_stitch into next single_crochet x 8 snip yarn and tie off knot loose ends together to secure the piece now we will make the flower s center make an magic_ring chain 2 ps^4 chain 2 slip_stitch into magic_ring snip yarn and tie off tighten the magic_ring and knot both loose ends together sew the center onto the the flower knot loose ends at the back to secure it begin sewing the flower onto the pot using the 4 loose ends left behind from the yarn knot for security and hide the ends by passing them through the body congrats you are done i hope you had fun making this if you have questions or are confused about any aspect of the pattern please message me on etsy @ fuzzyyarnfanatic i ll be happy to help
